page.title: 01PORTWAY JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: {Portway Junior School}was opened on 28th January l952. The original teachers were Mrs. V.M. Cooper, Mrs. Armstead and Mrs. Laurence, the head teacher was Miss M. Mea. The school opened with 72 children. In l955, Miss Mea left and Mr. Davis took command as acting head teacher for a while until Mr. Reid secured the post on 9th January l956. He retired on 30th April l974. {Mr. D. J. Holness took over on the same day and now in l985 he is still head teacher. The new fire-alarm was built in l976, this replaced the bell system. In l972 a large classroom was built and it contained three classes. It was called the Unit. Aabestos was claimed dangerous in l98l,there had been growing concern for some time that there was. At this present moment asbestos isstill being removed.
